actions.text: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Meadows.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B House Report 115-21 to require OIRA to keep a log of the "consultation"--which is any communication that occurs about a specific regulation before the regulation is submitted for review--for each regulation and to publish a list of all the consultations when the regulation is published in the Federal Register.
purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B House Report 115-21 to require OIRA to keep a log of the "consultation"--which is any communication that occurs about a specific regulation before the regulation is submitted for review--for each regulation and to publish a list of all the consultations when the regulation is published in the Federal Register.
